Introduction
This topic contains examples of award adjustments necessitated by a Veteran’s receipt of drill pay, including
training is completed during a prior year
Veteran provides advance notice of training
Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) increases the disability rating after the end of the fiscal year in question
VA increases the disability rating prior to the end of the fiscal year in question
VA reduces the Veteran’s disability rating
Veteran returns to active duty during a period VA withheld or is withholding benefits
regional office (RO) concurrently processes multiple
VA Forms 21-8951, Notice of Waiver of VA Compensation or Pension to Receive Military Pay and Allowances,
from the same Veteran for multiple fiscal years
VA is withholding compensation in its entirety to recoup separation benefits
VA is withholding part of the Veteran’s compensation to recoup separation benefits
, and
Veteran's benefits are subject to reduction/withholding based on incarceration and receipt of drill pay
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - Examples of Award Adjustments Necessitated by a Veteran's Election of Drill Pay
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
